activities: Variable is a privately held company that offers smart device  applications and related hardware. When a user registers for any Variable product, we may ask for information such as name, company name, email address, postal address and phone number. Variable uses collected information for the following general purposes: products and services provision, identification and authentication, services improvement, contact, and research. Variable does not share personal information with third parties, unless explicitly approved by the user.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: all client and customer personal data, manually processed and electronic
